paralysis_recovery: After paralysis starts at 175s, the robot recognizes new dynamics and trained new model at 440s, before the recovery at 1225s.
After learning, the paralysis model was utilized more than half of the time: 1.00>0.5.
After the recovery, the paralysis model was utilized less than half of the time: 0.20<0.5.
single_model: Robot approaches the goal [-100 -100]. The reached location is [-23.7636528  -27.02405739]. Thus start distance 141.45m > final distance 105.53m
During last 1/4 of the experiment, the robot approaches the goal each gait period. Minimal measured gait speed is 0.03 > 0.
During last 1/2 of the experiment, the world-model:zero-model log-odds do not rapidly decrease. Average log-odds change is -0.00 > -0.01
walk_learning: Expected 3 models learned during walk bootstrapping. 3 were trained.
